name: MILF - Artwork
detailed_description:
This DLC only contains artwork, you will receive all the (future) achievements in 350x350 (Except for the letter achievements, those are 64x64)

You will receive a video tutorial of me drawing a achievement with the right settings in Photoshop so you can do it yourself.

This DLC does not contain ingame content.

You can use all images anywhere you want, just don't charge money for it.
about_the_game:
This DLC only contains artwork, you will receive all the (future) achievements in 350x350 (Except for the letter achievements, those are 64x64)

You will receive a video tutorial of me drawing a achievement with the right settings in Photoshop so you can do it yourself.

This DLC does not contain ingame content.

You can use all images anywhere you want, just don't charge money for it.
short_description:
This DLC contains artwork in higher resolution and a video tutorial on how to draw amazing achievements in Photoshop easily.
When more achievements are made, they will also appear in the artwork DLC folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9-compatible graphics adapter with 128 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®9-compatible
